de.uniulm.omi.cloudiator.sword.core.util

Class LocationHierarchy

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uniulm.omi.cloudiator.sword.core.util.LocationHierarchy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Location>

    public class LocationHierarchy
extends Object
implements Iterable<Location>
    The LocationHierarchy class.

    Helper class for iterating over Locations and finding special locations of interest.

      • firstParentLocationWithScope

        public Optional<Location> firstParentLocationWithScope(LocationScope locationScope)
        Returns an Optional first parent location that has the given scope.

        Will iterate upwards through the location hierarchy and return the first location that matches the given scope.

        Parameters:
        locationScope - the scope to check for
        Returns:
        an Optional first parent location or Optional::empty
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the given locationScope is null.
